activities:
Use of Information

Information provided by Users or obtained from Users’ access to the Site is used by SPS primarily for two reasons: (1) to provide direct support and service to SPS’s customers and (2) to provide and improve the Site’s service and functionality. For example, SPS may use information submitted by a customer User to provide support for SPS equipment. Additionally, SPS may use IP addresses and other technical information to diagnose problems with our servers, to administer the Site or to gather general Site access information. Non-identifying and aggregate information may be used to improve the Site or may be shared with advertisers, if any. SPS may also contact Users regarding improvements to the Site, to provide information regarding a User account or with information about new services that are available to Users. An opt-out is provided with regard to the receipt of these communications as set forth below
